blog.name: artofthrones
blog.title: The Art of Ice and Fire
blog.description:
Game of Thrones/A Song of Ice and Fire Art Blog, None of these are original works.  If you re-blog from here, keep the artist's credits within your re-blog! Background and Avatar by the excellent Prokrik.

Spoilers in some pictures! Be wary, I'm not responsible for your discoveries!

Use the home link, or the orange top right X to navigate back home. 

Use the search or the image tags to find your favorite houses/characters. "HLS4" for histories and lore of season 4.

summary: Drunk in Wench Land - Chapter 3 - WackyGoofball - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Drunk in Wench Land - Chapter 3 - WackyGoofball - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 3/?
Fandom: Game of Thrones (TV), A Song of Ice and Fire & Related Fandoms
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Jaime Lannister/Brienne of Tarth
Characters: Jaime Lannister, Brienne of Tarth, Tyrion Lannister, Bronn (ASoIaF)
Additional Tags: Drunkenness, Drunken Confessions, Drunken Flirting, Drunken Kissing, In a way, Comedy, Romantic Comedy, Romance, Fluff, Fluff and Crack, Fluff and Humor, with some feels in-between, Banter, Fighting, drunk!Jaime, he is so much fun, and witty, and Brienne isn’t having any of it, and he thinks he is so clever

Summary:

Brienne prepares for another quiet weekend by herself when suddenly, her peace is interrupted when someone rings her doorbell, someone she did not at all expect because they never met outside the office.

And that man is clearly drunk and, as always, out for trouble.

Chapter Summary:

Jaime and Brienne finally reach his apartment, but both are in for some life-changing revelations.

summary:
This is the most special scene in whole show . Daenerys Targaryen and Jon Snow reborn 
This isn't accidentally moment .  This is...
body:
The most special scene!

This is the most special scene in whole show . Daenerys Targaryen and Jon Snow reborn

This isn’t accidentally moment . This is a intended scene of Dany and Jon. The most important is that they are naked. This was to clean and reincarnation.

Dany cleaned with Fire and Blood , Jon cleaned with Ice. They are like newborn baby. They’re start of new world . They are new word in Westeros .

Look at this scene. That’s some.

title: Shadows 8/??
body:
(A Whisper excerpt)

And he was doing the best he could. It was in every thoughtful crease of his brow whenever he got lost in thought. It was in the wry smiles he sometimes gave as if recalling a personal joke that was hardly funny. It was in the restless murmurs as he tossed and turned in bed, something she had noticed after their first round of lovemaking. It was why she had started kissing him; tender, soothing kisses to his drawn brows down to the strain around his down turned lips. And she hadn’t been kidding about not having the heart to wake him later. She had never seen him look that…relaxed, and knowing she was responsible for it, made her feel like she had achieved something monumental.

Continue on AO3

Thanks again to the lovely ladies @annagreengrass for the mood board and the talented @ice-and-fire-trash for the wonderful image you’ll see in the chapter. Enjoy!
